Subject: question for C++ programmers ....

I'm starting to learn C++. I would like to do some
simple 2-D graphics, and I don't know what's
available.  I realize that C++ has no built-in
graphics so that I have to use an add-on package of
some kind.  I would like something fairly easy to
learn and use.  I would like it portable so that both
linux and Windows users can run my programs.  I prefer
something fairly popular, so that I can easily find
other experienced users for help or collaboration. 
Any suggestions?

Thanks,

m

Mitchell Timin
